Params: {2: 'Tom', 3: 'How many times do I have to tell you? This is our sandpit!'}
{2: 'Katie', 3: "Stop coming to our turf! We're not going to play with you! Go away!"}
{2: 'Tom', 3: 'Ha, learned your lesson yet? Now scram!'}
{2: 'Katie', 3: "You're in for a beating if you don't scram now!"}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'But... I want to play here too... Grandpa said...'}
{2: 'Tom', 3: 'Grandpa? That old nutcase who got chased out of town? The crazy old nutter adopted a D-U-M-M-Y! Dummy!'}
{2: 'Katie', 3: 'The crazy old nutter adopted a dummy—'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Grandpa is not a crazy old nutter! Grandpa is very good to me! And he's really awesome, too! Y-you two don't know a thing!"}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You don't know anything... You're lying! I won't allow you to speak ill of Grandpa! Or else I'll—"}
{2: 'Tom', 3: "You'll what? The dummy who doesn't even know how to fight."}
